titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale College Records Concerning Student Discipline
Yale College Records Concerning Student Discipline
titlestmt.author: compiled by staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:15

did.unittitle: Yale College records concerning student discipline

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The materials consist of judgements, petitions, dismissals, correspondence, and confessions documenting student discipline at Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 41 (YRG 41), Material documenting Yale student life.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale College Records Concerning Student Discipline (RU 811). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of judgements, petitions, dismissals, correspondence, and confessions documenting student discipline at Yale.
